attributes_list.attribute_description: Rather than using the absolute number of years, it is typical to use age groups.
attributes_list.attribute_values_and_range: The following is a preliminary set of age groups: 6-12, 12-18, 15-25, 25-35, 35-45, 45-55, 55-65, 65-75, older than 75 years

attributes_list.attribute_description: The racial background of the user.
The ethnic origin of the user that could relate to a combination of racial background, language and religion.
attributes_list.attribute_values_and_range: List of target ethnicities. e.g. Arabic, Easter-European, etc.

attributes_list.attribute_description: Literacy level will be represented by the highest degree or level of school attended.
attributes_list.attribute_values_and_range: None, Nursery school, High school, Bachelor’s degree, Master’s degree, Ph.D., Other

attributes_list.attribute_description: The employment status of the user
Income level will be represented using a set of qualitative ranges, rather than an absolute number
attributes_list.attribute_values_and_range: Qualitative ranges of monthly income, e.g. a 5-scale range from low to high.
Single, in a relationship, married, separated, other
